title: CCL trains experiencing delays due to signal interference

updates.text: [CCL] UPDATE: Tests have been completed. Telco signals will progressively resume along Circle Line.
[CCL] Due to ongoing tests, commuters travelling along the CCL will experience temporary suspension of Telco signals.
Due to intermittent signal interference, CCL trains may experience delays. For safety, CCL trains are manned this evening. We are sorry.
